name: Proto.io
description:
Import your Figma designs into Proto.io and create fully-interactive prototypes that feel real. 


Use Proto.io's extensive prototyping, animation, and interactivity capabilities to enhance your Figma designs into fully-interactive prototypes that feel real. 


Share the prototype with your stakeholders to get valuable feedback, and validate your idea by user testing with popular platforms. 


Export your finished Proto.io prototype to HTML, PNG, and PDF or easily embed it in your website, blog or productivity tool of your choice.


Try Proto.io for free for 15 days - no credit card required. When your trial ends you can upgrade to a paid subscription plan or downgrade to a free plan with limited options.


------------------------


Here are just a few examples of what you can achieve in Proto.io: 

✅ Use interactive form fields like text inputs, toggles, and sliders. 

✅ Add video, audio, and lottie animations, and control them with powerful interactions.

✅ Create fine-tuned micro-animations using Proto.io’s animation timeline. 

✅ Use variables to capture and display user input.
